config.enable-mod.name: Enable Mod
config.enable-mod.desc: When enabled, this mod will function.
config.show-unmet-npcs-on-social-page.na: Show Unmet NPCs on Social Page
config.show-unmet-npcs-on-social-page.de: When enabled, unmet NPCs will be displayed on the Social Page.
config.min-hearts-for-social-page.name: Min Hearts for Social Page
config.min-hearts-for-social-page.desc: This is the number of friendship hearts an NPC must have to be shown on the Social Page. Setting this value to 0 means all met NPCs will be displayed. A value of 1 means only NPCs with at least one heart will be displayed.
config.max-hearts-for-social-page.name: Max Hearts for Social Page
config.max-hearts-for-social-page.desc: This is the maximum number of friendship hearts an NPC must have to be shown on the Social Page. Setting this value to the largest value means all met NPCs will be displayed. A value of 10 means only NPCs with at most ten hearts will be displayed.
config.show-unmet-npcs-on-calendar.name: Show Unmet NPCs on Calendar
config.show-unmet-npcs-on-calendar.desc: When enabled, unmet NPCs will be displayed on the birthday calendar.
This is the number of friendship hearts an NPC must have to be shown on the birthday calendar. Setting this value to 0 means all met NPCs will be displayed. A value of 1 means only NPCs with at least one heart will be displayed.
This is the maximum number of friendship hearts an NPC must have to be shown on the birthday calendar. Setting this value to the largest value means all met NPCs will be displayed. A value of 10 means only NPCs with at most ten hearts will be displayed.
